ygData.subject: Re: [rest-discuss] Restful Email
ygData.msgSnippet: It seems to me that email is pretty darn RESTful in its SMTP and POP forms. SMTP: put a message. POP: get a message, get meta data about the collection, delete

Content-Type: text/plain; charset=UTF-8
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

It seems to me that email is pretty darn RESTful in its SMTP and
POP forms. SMTP: put a message. POP: get a message, get
meta data about the collection, delete a message.

HTTP isn't in it.  It's a RESTful architectural style already.

What am I missing here?

-Randy Fischer

--000325572b1e1307bf046947148e
Content-Type: text/html; charset=UTF-8
